attributes.action: Abolish NetZero & Climate Change Act 2008. Declare There is NO Climate Emergency
attributes.additional_details:
We consider that the scientific opinions of the global network of many hundreds of eminent, high profile and experienced scientists in climate and related fields from Clintel & The CO2 Coalition including Nobel Laureates  who are jointly declaring "There Is No (man made) Climate Crisis"  should be equally heard in a fresh Parliamentary debate on 'Climate Change'.

We consider that this is a two sided scientific debate and  NOT settled consensus science, as required  for major national policy.
attributes.background: We are concerned that parliament in passing the Climate Change Act 2008 and setting NetZero targets has not been fully informed of both sides of the scientific debate on whether there is or is not any significant human influence on climate from human Carbon Dioxide (CO2) emissions.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which we think are similar to yours:

Repeal the Climate Change Act 2008: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639235

Hold a referendum on the 2050 Net Zero target: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636066
